bibl.title: Marie Le Fevre, Yvonne Le Fevre, & Georgette Normand v. M. Angelique. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The Superior Court of King County

div1.p: In the Superior Court of King County State of Washington
In the matter of the application of Yvonne LeFevre, Marie LeFevre and Georgette Normad for A Writ of Habeas Corpus} ORDER

Upon reading and filing the application and petition of H.C. Gill for a writ of Habeas Corpus directing M.Angelique, Sister Superior of the House of Good Shepard to have and produce before this court the said Yvonne LeFevre, Marie LeFevre and Georgette Normand, and it appearing to the court that a writ should issue as prayed for in said petition

It is hereby ordered, that a writ of Habeas Corpus be issued by the Clerk of this court under the seal of the Court directing the said M.Angelique to have and produce before this court the said Yvonne LeFevre, Marie LeFevre and Georgette Normandon the 14th day of Febuary, 1903, at the hour of 9:30 o'clock at the forenoon to do and receive what has been ordered concerning her, andto have then and there the said writ
Done in open Court this 13th day of February, 1903.
